eu.monnetproject.mrd

Interface Sense


  • public interface Sense
    A sense that is attached to a generated lexical result.
    Author:
    John McCrae

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDefinition(eu.monnetproject.lang.Language language)
      Get a sting definition of this sense in a given language
      Collection<eu.monnetproject.lang.Language> getDefinitionLanguages()
      Get the set of languages for which defintions exist
      MRDEntry getEntry()
      Get the entry that contains this sense
      Collection<LexicalRelationInstance> getRelations(LexicalRelation relation)
      Get any known lexical relations

    • Method Detail

      • getRelations

        Collection<LexicalRelationInstance> getRelations(LexicalRelation relation)
        Get any known lexical relations
        Returns:
        A set of instances, empty if no relations exist

      • getDefinition

        String getDefinition(eu.monnetproject.lang.Language language)
        Get a sting definition of this sense in a given language
        Parameters:
        language - The language of the definition
        Returns:
        Get the defintion of this sense, or null if no definition exists for this language

      • getDefinitionLanguages

        Collection<eu.monnetproject.lang.Language> getDefinitionLanguages()
        Get the set of languages for which defintions exist
        Returns:
        The set of languages for which definitions exist, or an empty collection if no definitions are known

      • getEntry

        MRDEntry getEntry()
        Get the entry that contains this sense
        Returns:
        The entry
